description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Header' that displays the application's title, subtitle, and user-related actions such as login/logout. It manages user state, syncs with local storage changes, and includes logic for obtaining the current user asynchronously.

methods.name: Header({ title, subtitle })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the header bar with title, subtitle, and user menu.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout, clears user state, and redirects to login page.
